data.name: If You Go Down In The Woods Today
data.detailed_description:
It's your first day as a park ranger, and you've been stationed in the middle of the woods. The instructions left by the previous ranger are quite concerning, including mentions of creatures that you can't outrun and buildings that will keep you safe. How long will you be able to survive your new neighbors?

-- Game Play--

- Manage your health and ammo supplies as you take on an endless onslaught of merciless cryptids

- Engage in all distances of combat with your trusty bolt-action rifle and hunting knife

- Navigate the expansive forest to locate important supplies and new vantage points

- Seek refuge in safe zones or keep moving through the woods

data.short_description: In this round-based survival game, you play as a forest ranger who has been stationed in the middle of the woods. The other residents of the forest are none too happy with your presence and will stop at nothing to bring it to an end. How long will you survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i7-4720HQ
  • Graphics: GTX 960M
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
